name: UnifyID
description:
Hate passwords? So do we. We believe that within five years, passwords will no longer be the predominant method of authentication.

We are UnifyID, a Stanford StartX S15 company that is building a revolutionary identity platform based on implicit authentication. Our solution allows people to identify themselves in a unique way that is extremely difficult to forge or crack. Best of all, we are doing it in a way that respects user privacy.
